did.unittitle: Conversation with Harry Edwards Audio-Visual Materials, 1978
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

bioghist.p: Harry Edwards (1942-) an African American Sociologist who graduated from Cornell University with a PhD, and is Professor Emeritus of Sociology at the University of California, Berkeley.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Conversation with Harry Edwards Audio-Visual Materials #/4017 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
